HDG.LOG.content: thinking changes the world, changes world in ever darker depths of a riddle (Rätsel) > riddle propounded (zugesagt) to us [for a long time] in word “Being” > Being remains only the provisional (vorläufige) word [Being originally called “presencing (Anwesen),” enduring-here-before in unconcealment (her-vor-währen in die Unverborgenheit)] [truth and security, Wahrheit]
HDG.LOG.linkedContent: thinking changes the world, changes world in ever darker depths of a riddle (Rätsel) > riddle propounded (zugesagt) to us [for a long time] in word “Being” > Being remains only the provisional (vorläufige) word [Being originally called “presencing (Anwesen),” enduring-here-before in unconcealment (her-vor-währen in die Unverborgenheit)] [truth and security, Wahrheit]

HDG.IM.content: German idealism didn’t collapse, age wasn’t great enough to stand up to greatness, breadth, originality of spiritual world, to realize it (more than apply propositions/insights) > Dasein began to lack depth (from which essential comes/returns to human beings), a leveling, no more rank (a blind mirror that no longer mirrors) [w/out rank, can’t stand up to greatness of spirit, but what about the greatness of killing that spirit? (e.g. Nietzsche)]
HDG.IM.linkedContent: German idealism didn’t collapse, age wasn’t great enough to stand up to greatness, breadth, originality of spiritual world, to realize it (more than apply propositions/insights) > Dasein began to lack depth (from which essential comes/returns to human beings), a leveling, no more rank (a blind mirror that no longer mirrors) [w/out rank, can’t stand up to greatness of spirit, but what about the greatness of killing that spirit? (e.g. Nietzsche)]

HDG.MA.content: truly joyous/salutary work, “artist must be able to mount from the depth of his home ground up into the ether”
HDG.MA.linkedContent: truly joyous/salutary work, “artist must be able to mount from the depth of his home ground up into the ether”

HDG.CCP.content: night neighbors the stars, binds together w/out seam, edge or thread [Derrida beyond Heidegger] > neighbors because she works only w/ nearness > wondering upon depths of the height > wonder can open what is locked > by way of waiting > if this is released > and human nature remains appropriated to that > from whence we’re called
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: night neighbors the stars, binds together w/out seam, edge or thread [Derrida beyond Heidegger] > neighbors because she works only w/ nearness > wondering upon depths of the height > wonder can open what is locked > by way of waiting > if this is released > and human nature remains appropriated to that > from whence we’re called

HDG.LP.content: “so quiet” appears again and again in Trakl, quiet (leise) means slow (langam) > night, blue game, shy, gentle sheaf: “the sheaf of blueness gathers the depth (Tiefe) of the holy in the depths (Grund) of its bond” > holy withholds in withdrawing > Es [the holy] verschenkt seine Ankunft [bestows its arrival], indem es sich in den verhaltenden Entzug verwahrt [while/by guarding itself in its withholding withdrawal]
HDG.LP.linkedContent: “so quiet” appears again and again in Trakl, quiet (leise) means slow (langam) > night, blue game, shy, gentle sheaf: “the sheaf of blueness gathers the depth (Tiefe) of the holy in the depths (Grund) of its bond” > holy withholds in withdrawing > Es [the holy] verschenkt seine Ankunft [bestows its arrival], indem es sich in den verhaltenden Entzug verwahrt [while/by guarding itself in its withholding withdrawal]

HDG.LP.content: in Trakl, blue not an image to mark holy [symbol?], blue is the depth of the holy—because of its gathering > frozen rigor (Starre) of animal face not that of dead [rigor mortis], gathers into silent gaze (Aussehen) toward holy
HDG.LP.linkedContent: in Trakl, blue not an image to mark holy [symbol?], blue is the depth of the holy—because of its gathering > frozen rigor (Starre) of animal face not that of dead [rigor mortis], gathers into silent gaze (Aussehen) toward holy

HDG.LP.content: beneath the one semblance is concealed the Einfalt of pain, flaming the furthest when holds to itself most intimately [beholding vision] > pain as Grundzug of great soul, in pure harmony w/ holiness of blue: “blue shines upon the soul’s face by withdrawing into its own depth” > holy is present (west)/endures (währt) only by keeping w/in this withdrawal (in diesem Entzug verhält), turning vision toward fitting (Fügsame) [via flame of pain]
